Room.Name: Desolate Corridor
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the corner of the desolate cavern filled with dust and cobwebs.
Room.LongDescription: The dimly lit cavern doesn't appear to have supported any life of any kind for the past century or so. The dust is so heavy, it's likely to cover up anything that might be lying around on the floor. The hallway runs to the north and east.
